content.detailedDescription:
I noticed the object while taking out the dog for a bathroom break.

i can only say what i have found the object was not:

not venus. saw object about 1 hour and twenty minutes after sunset. with clouds it was too bright and elevation too high.

not star. nearly complete light cloud cover. no stars visible. definitely under clouds.

not conventional aircraft. steady bright white light. no indication of any side or other flashing lights. 

checked online air traffic radar and found no commercial craft in that direction. 

when sight lost, object did not fade as if flying into cloud cover. it gave a brief flash then was gone. 

have not checked height of cloud cover. from my point to known ceiling at an elevation of about six degrees, bearing about 253 degrees, should give approximate height and location of object.
content.summary: Not venus

content.detailedDescription: I well receive your email and yes i will like to meet one of your investigators but is it too late things happend in 1976, 1985 and more    don't have any pictures any clothes only memories. it happens so often i will don't know were to begin '  my phone number in quebec city is [phone number removed/cms/tg]!  i am so happy that you wrote to me that i am rying right now it is very hard to keep al this for me! only my family knows about those event and the people who were with me at thetime it happens!
content.summary: Multiple abductions over many years.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work went outside to smoke looked up into the stars as i always do and there i saw a bright blue light the same light i seen a few days ago.So i grabbed my phone and started recording again
content.summary: I was at work working went outside to smoke on the porches. looked up at the stars and seen the same object i seen about 2days ago pulled out my phone and started recording

content.detailedDescription: On 11/13, 2001, i was part of a pilot/project north of campbell river, i was a forestry climber. at around 6:30 am i heard a loud crash, to am amazement i actually seen the "object" crash. i called over some of my co-workers, and to our amazement e.T. was alive, but he/it was severely damaged. we called the weyerhauser guys into investigate. they managed to get it safely off the mountain side with the use of 2 seperate heli-copters. now what has happened to e.T., we will never know, because like me too, everyone has been told that e.T., needed to learn a lesson, on manners and such... i know e.T. is alive and kicking--- he told me of his escapades with such beings as sasquatch, and satan himself
content.summary: Soft and cuddlely , covered in blood

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone as he was observing the object: 

i am a commercial pilot and live 14 miles north of kci airport in kansas city. i am observing an object in the sky right now that i cannot explain. 

my wife is in st. joseph, mo and she is watching it from her position. she is looking sw. 

i am looking wsw and believe the object may be over kansas. it is a large white sphere, is very bright, and has smaller objects going in and out of the larger object at the 6:00 position and 10:00 position. one object is going in to the 6:00 position, and six objects going out of the 10:00 position. i can only see the smaller objects with binoculars. i estimate the altitude to be at 10,000 feet. as a trained observer, i know this is not a
planet, but is something very close. i watched this object for 20-30 minutes until clouds obscured it. it was visible for a few more minutes and clouds opened up, but finally was no longer visible.
content.summary: Large stationary object with smaller objects going to and from it for 20-40 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Two weeks ago my husband was awakened out of my sleep in the early morning hours and saw a small red laser light that traveled across the ceiling and down the northwest corner of the bedroom wall.  i reported the incident to the local police department.  our first thought was that someone was playing a prank with either a laser pointer or worst case scenario a gun sight.  i did however; have a problem with my husband’s laser theory because his bedroom window has heavy bamboo blinds that are pulled more than halfway down.  it would be difficult for anything to penetrate the thick bamboo blinds.   as far as i was aware that was the only incident that occurred that night.  this morning he called me into his bedroom and told me that he had seen a being in his bedroom around 6:00 am. he said that it appeared to be self illuminating. “very bright” he said it was about my height, which is approximately 5 foot five inches and that it glowed and it had no face.He said it's head was a little larger than human. he said when he saw it; the being was near the bedroom door, apparently when it realized my husband was watching it, the being looked slightly over its shoulder at my husband and very quickly exited the bedroom.   my husband said it had no discernible features, it had no face.  it was then he told me that the night he’s seen the laser, he’d had also seen an approx 3 foot by 3 foot square shape projected on the mirror of his closet doors. he said it looked like a large picture frame and that there was a very bright light illuminating from within it, with strange black symbols that resembled hieroglyphic‘s inside of what he described as small boxes they were also illuminated.  he said he’s never seen anything like them before. i asked him why he hadn't mentioned this before.  he told me that he couldn't understand how there was this large imagine in his mirror, because there are no windows on the west wall of his bedroom, so it couldn't have been a reflection. he wasn't going to mention it until he saw the being this morning.  he told me he’s very unnerved about these sightings, since they are becoming repetitive. i'm concerned because my husband is not one to make-up stories. he's very practical down to earth kind of person. if he said he saw something, he did. but he wouldn't file this report however, he did give me permission to file on his behalf. and that he will relate the story if asked about it. i found some pictures on the internet and asked if any were similar to what he saw in projected on the mirror. he choose this picture, as it was very close to what he saw.
content.summary: A self illuminating being about 5 feet with a little larger head than a human, no face.

content.detailedDescription: I was around 4 or 5 years old, i got up late at night to go to the bathroom while reliving myself i noticed a humming sound outside my second story house window. when i got done i stood up on the toilet to look if i could find where the sound was coming from. what i saw out the window on the ground in our backyard was what looked to me like a merry go round, different colored lights going around in a circle. i watched transfixed for a minute or two then went back to bed. in the morning i told my family, two brothers, two sisters, my mom and grand mom that i saw a merry go round in the back yard. being the youngest they just laughed it off but i wanted to know what happened to the merry go round. after breakfast i went out and looked around, i couldn't find anything. all the other homes on that block were empty, i found out later that the city was buying them up to build a freeway off ramp. i never forgot this event and fourth some odd years later i brought it up at a family reunion and one of my sisters remembered me telling them about it. until she said "ya when you saw the ufo" i never truly put it together but now i know what it was and it shouldn't have been there. i'll attach a screen shot from google earth of where it happened if possible.
content.summary: One of my first memory’s, backed up by family 40 years later.

content.detailedDescription: i was outside early morning on december 26 around 9:30am to film the so called chem trails to show my wife whom had not woken up yet, sure seems like there was more than normal.  i was using my samsung galaxy note 4 cell phone, i really didn't even notice the object until i uploaded the photos to my computer. after i uploaded them i then saw something strange in the photo, so i zoomed in on it. i know my aircraft but i'm not sure what is showing up in these photos. i have no ideal what it is that i photographed. by submitting these photos maybe they can be sent to the right person and be identified. i would sure like to know.
content.summary: Photographing  chem trails or contrails?

content.detailedDescription:
Was walking home after work when i saw a very bright light above tb observatory. took up my cellphone to take a picture.
took the picture, looked down at my phone and when i looked back up the object was gone.
spoke the next day to the people that work at the observatory and they where not on location that morning. spoke to police and the didnt have helicopters or airplane in the area. i also called the electrical company and they didnt have any issues in the area that morning. 
with some help from the people at the observatory we calculated that i was located 1km from the object, the tower is 30m wide and the objekt above the tower seemse to be 1/3 of the length of the tower witch makes the objekt 10m wide.
content.summary: Bright light over observatory

content.detailedDescription:
I woke about 3am on the 14th october 2014 as i normally did.  as i was making a cup of tea i noticed, out of the corner of my eyes, a flash in the sky. thinking i was going to witness a lightening storm i turned off the lights and sat watching the dark sky. a few minutes later there was a bright flash and i saw clearly a massive craft hovering over warton aerodrome. the craft was lit up with two rows of lights one row above the other.  the image it has left in my mind is like that of a big cruise ship lit up in the dark. it was massive! i was stunned and terrified.

i grabbed my mobile phone, aimed it at the craft and pressed record. the flash on my camera flashed and reflected off my windows and blinded me for a few seconds. i dropped to the floor convinced that who ever was in the craft will have seen my camera flashing in the window. when i looked again the craft had disappeared.

i pulled myself together and gave myself a good talking to and tried to convince myself i had imagined it. i took my tablet that also has a camera and i aimed it in the direction that i had seen the craft and pressed record. leaving the camera running i sat in the dark and waited.

i witnessed a jet coming from east to west and i watched as it approached the area i had seen the craft. the jet just stopped in the sky and hovered and as it did the craft appeared like a flash and was all lit up with two rows of lights. the jet hovered in front of this craft and at that point i ran to get my son to have a look. by the time i got him out of bed to look both the craft and the plane had gone.

my tablet camera picked up the massive flash in the sky and also it picked up a spot light coming over the top of my window before with-drawing. my camera has sound and there was no sound from whatever came over the top of my building.
i know what i saw and it has left me feeling afraid. i want to know why it was there and am i at any risk because of trying to film them. i also know there is not much point in being told i imagined it all because the whole situation lasted about an hour and half and i know what i saw.
i am not good with computers so cannot send the video i took.
content.summary: Bright flash in sky early hours. flash lit up massive craft

content.detailedDescription: I just came home from work no more then ten minutes. i let the dog out in the backyard and played with her. while she was doing her thing and just going crazy. i crossed my arms and looked towards the stars and said to myself "did that really happen the other night? what were they and where did they go." as soon as i said that one came flying right over the trees right in front of me. then theirs another one right behind the first one! i'm freaking out a bit. i said out loud "is this really them" and then one turns off. the only way i can explain how they looked. is like a ember in the fire. it was glowing bright pumpkin orange and when it turned off it looked like a ember in fire. it had a heating element of some sorts. i rushed in to the house and grabbed my roommate of the couch. as i was as running in with pickle by my side(my girlfriends dog) i looked back and saw three more orbs right behind the first two before i ran in the backdoor.  i rushed in to the house and grabbed my buddy. we made to the backyard in time to catch the last two flying over us. i look at mcvay and said "what the hell is that?" and as soon as we said something the last one turned off. i could still see the object flying in the night sky. you can see it was some type of metal orb. it was the size of mini van and we watched it fly off right over bradley creek. these were the exact same objects in saw two day before. did they follow me? are the always around? why did they appear when i questioned their existence?
content.summary: I witnessed seven orbs in my backyard . just two days before i saw the same objects at work

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on the 605 frwy at approx. 7:30pm my daughter and i observed 2 very distinct flashes of light in the sky as a plane passed at the right of the flashes and a much higher altitude.  no object observed but the flashes of light were none this 56 year old man has ever observed.  the 2 flashes were rectangular in shape and the size of a small fist in the windshield.  3 inches wide by 2 inches tall, picture that size rectangle and draw clovers around it and that is what the shape of the flashes appeared to be in the windshield at a distance of about 100 yards.  the flashes were very unigue and extremely bright and very fast and then nothing in the sky, a plane flew by at a much higher altitude and towards the west of the 2 flashes.  my daughter and i both expelled the term "whoa!" at the same moment as the flashes appeared, we scowered the sky but could not locate any near objects except for a distant plane.
content.summary: 2 flower shaped rectangular flashes in the night sky as a plane approached from a higher altitude, no faa lights on the object.

content.detailedDescription:
We ( 2 people inside the car ) were driving and the ocean was in our left side, i saw a big and bright light in the sky, but it wasn´t very high..I didn´t pay too much attention. we stopped the car and now the ocean was in our front and the light we could see, it was big and very intense and it wasn´t moving. just there, still. i first thought it could be a star but it was bigger then the stars i normally see at night in the sky.
we kept looking at the light and it started to move but as in a slow motion, sometimes to the left, sometimes to the right, but always at the same altitude. and what surprised us was the fact that altitude was very low. at this time we were like yeahhhh and we were asking to each other " what is this again for real? " ( because it was not the first time we saw strange lights in a very short period of time and moving and taking directions very different as planes or helicopters) 
it stood there during 30 minutes +/-, to start moving to east direction but in a very low altitude a very slowly. it drove way always to the east  ´till we loose sight of it.
content.summary: Bright light above the ocean without moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I had a game camera in my drive way on april 18 2013 to video tape night activity. my paper comes early in the morning and i went out to get it at 4:26 am. i didn't see, hear, or feel anything out of the ordinary. when i checked the recording that morning , i noticed the lights. see attachment. i had a similar experience several weeks later. when i checked the recording that morning, there was the same type of beam of light outside our home directed through a second floor sliding doors to an area where i sit and watch tv at night. i have that video as well. the beam of light on both occasions seem to know when it was going but i felt nothing. however  around the 20th of october 2013 i had a very strange and realistic dream which i wont go into details here but the result was several days later i had to go to the emergency room because of a badly bruised and painful right hip. i have the
 x-rays but the doctor could not find any explanation for injury.
content.summary: Pulsating light

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work one night. i've had many sightings my whole life so my eyes are always looking towards the stars. i had the top off the jeep and sky's were clear. i noticed a squash shape object glowing off in the distance. it was twinkling like a orange jewel. i watched it for about ten seconds and then all of a sudden three lights turned on revealing a massive ufo. the first object i was watching flew right into the large ship. as soon as it entered the craft the lights turned off and it was like it was never there. i continued to drive to work but, i was completely at awe with what i just witnessed. so i arrived at the farm and made my way to the cross roads(a very open area where a lot of roads meet) i park the jeep and take the windshield down and i'm looking in the direction of where everything just happened. almost five minutes went bye and nothing was happening. i was freaking out a bit and didn't know if i really just saw that. then something tells me to look up and to the right. i brought my head out of my hands and look up. over my right shoulder their was orange orbs turn off and on. this went on for a few minutes and they would stop.Then they would come back on and if i reached for my phone they would turn off. i felt like they were communicating threw esp. they were telling me to stop pulling my phone out. that this was for me to see and to watch. i watched them build stairs and unbuild them. it was as if they were signaling me or communicating with me in some way. after they did what i call the grand finally. there was on orb off to the right. it looked like a star had fallen from space. it was twinkling like a dimiond. it hovered there for a few minutes. then out of no where it exploded but, no like you think. it had no sound and when it exploded it didn't turn into fragments or pieces. it turned into more orbs but they were different colors. they hung like a frown and there were three tears. a large one on top and two smaller ones beneath it. the orbs were blue,pink,yellow,white and a few other colors. i watched them for a matter of minutes. then of in the distance is heard a fighter jet. i looked around but saw nothing as soon as i looked back in the direction of the ufos they were gone. the jet sounded far away but i looked up and it was flying right over me. it was so low i could see that it was a raptor and it was in some type of stealth mode and had its after burners covered with a shield. then right behind the jet came two twin blade black helicopters. the huge type of helicopters. the ones where the doors open on the back. they flew around for a twenty minutes or so with spot lights on looking all around the area and then they disappeared. after they left i sat on the forklift wondering if they were still out there. as soon as i thought that one turned on in the sky just to let me know they were still out there. not even one minute went by and one of the helicopters came hauling assistance back.Two days later they appeared right in my back yard and right over my head. my roommate witnessed it with me but i'm going to file that experience as another report because it happened to days later and nearly fourty miles away.
content.summary: I witnessed a massive disk ship in the clouds and afterwards i saw a dozen or more orbs turn off and on and build stairs and shapes.

content.detailedDescription:
On jan. 27th, 2015 @ 6:30pm i saw a very bright yellowish light over green mountain. i was driving westbound on colfax (speer and colfax) when i spotted the object. still driving westbound i could see that this ball of light would dim, grow brighter and dim again, sometimes changing colors (redish, green, yellow). i continued westbound and observed a helicopter fly towards the odject, flying straight towards the bright light then turning northwest, almost like it was just checking out what this object was. i drove to a park located behind dino's restaurant/walgreens near kipling and w. colfax. i parked my car and watched this bright light hover and move a bit north towards golden for about ten minutes. i have a large maglite led flashlight in my car and i decided to aim it towards the bright ball of light. flashing it on and off i noticed that the ball of light would pulse, continued to move northwest towards the big 'm' on the mountain near colorado school of mines. the bright light slowly dropped down, hovered just above the mountain, then disappeared from view around 7pm. 

over the past few days i have seen this bright ball of light pretty much in the same location, same time (6-6:30pm) and i observed it again on 2/2/15 at 6:33 pm. also, i have seen it in the early morning hours (6am 1/30/15) over red rocks/the hogback area. i'd say that if your reading this and you live in the denver area, please pick up a camera/cell phone, whatever and record, snap pics of this thing in the sky. it seemed to interact with my flashing of my maglite, dimming and growing brighter. i'd also say that a good observation point of this object during the nighttime hours is the observation area located at the top of the hill on w. colfax near youngfield st. (blue star memorial park). this seems to be a nightly event!
content.summary: Light over green mountain

content.detailedDescription: 1: at my condo on the beach 12th floor, 2: too obvious not to, 3: flares,  4: gold-ish orbs - triangle formation west side  were the two the other middle pointing east, at one time the top west one moved very fast up my guess ~ 300 feet for a 3-4 seconds then right back into formation, 5: holy crap! to the other person do you see that?!! person said yes wow! we both watched it for ~ 5 minutes 6: we are in a regular approach flight zone for our area... but i see like 50+ a day not a plane! what made it/them move is when a plane (private jet size)was getting close, then they just "zoomed" to the east out of my view from a building but i stood up - never saw them again... (i will make a copy of my detailed sketch and send it )
content.summary: 3 orbs gold in color over the gulf, good point of reference - 2nd witness that wishes to remain anonymous..

content.detailedDescription:
I was almost 19 in march 1982, on my way to work the graveyard shift at a printing co, taking a rural route between bartlesville (where i lived) and dewey. i do not remember exact the date of the event today. i was going north on virginia rd and just before the turnoff to go east at 9th st which would take me into dewey, i noticed a low red light to the northeast, miles away, near busy highway 75. the light had never been there before so caught my attention. i assumed it was a broadcasting tower being erected so i decided to take a longer route of two miles further north before turning to head east toward hwy 75 and this light. it was indiscernible from an ordinary red light on any communications tower except that it alternately pulsated or remained on for several seconds.
i made the turn onto county road 1300 to head east toward 75 and went another two miles until i could tell there was no tower. i was absolutely amazed as i pulled up until parallel to it from the road and stopped near where railroad tracks crossed. it was close, on the north side of the road, roughly 100' in the air and maybe 150' from the road where i was stopped. this is when i got excited. there are sporadic houses here about 1/4 mile from hwy 75 and i was trying to figure out what this was when a white light appeared a few feet to the left of the red. the lights appeared to be larger than a light bulb and smaller than a cantaloupe. i cannot remember now how they sequenced, but the red light and white lights (eventually there were three white ones to the left of the red one, separated by a few feet) but they would pulse on/off or remain on at different times. then a beam of bright white spotlight shone straight down. this was directly into a back yard of a house that sat to the north of my position. now i'm thinking "my gosh! it's a ufo!"
then the beam that was shining straight down flashed off/on/off/on, then in a smooth mechanical fashion slowly directed it up 90 degrees until it was shining to straight west. i never saw a body or object, just these lights, which was strange because it was so close, although it was night.
my mind is racing now. i'm thinking "how many others from the highway are noticing this? isn't anyone else going to pull down here and check this out?!" it was a true phenomenon occurring. i looked to the house on the south side of the road and saw a curtain open and wondered if they saw it or if they were wondering what the heck i was doing parked in front of their home. i was also thinking i'm going to be late for work if i don't leave now. it was a very tough decision.
this is when the spotlight shining west went out, along with the white lights, and it began to drift west very slowly. at the first movement after it being stationary (it took me a few minutes to get to it from where i initially sighted it and it remained stationary for another 1-2 minutes after i stopped next to it before "drifting" to the west, parallel to this road i was on) i heard a very slight sound that i can only describe as a person with a wide open mouth quietly sighing next to you. i do not know for sure if it was from this object, but the noise occurred just as the lone red light (the other lights all went out upon it moving and the simultaneous noise i heard) began to drift straight west at what i would estimate as jogging speed, maybe 5mph.
i decided to get to work and not follow it. 
when i got to work, a miracle happened. my supervisor said we are low on orders to run on your machine. he gave me the option of sweeping floors all night or going home. i flew back out to that location and drove west on rd 1300 from hwy 75. i drove two miles past where i initially observed it and turned to go south toward bartlesville and there it was again! now it was only a white light halfway up the side of a wooded hill separated from me by about 1000' of pasture. it was to the west of me. i observed this light do a slow, methodical "study" pattern, rise a few feet, stop, drift a few feet, stop, lower a few feet, stop, repeat...Now i'm downright spooked. i'm alone on this desolate road with very few distant houses around and it's dark. i decided to race three miles home and wake my dad to ask if he wanted to see what i saw. i wanted another witness too. i was excited that he agreed and we sped back out there but dammit it was finally gone. my dad believed me though, thankfully. we drove around the area foi was almost 19 in march 1982, on my way to work the graveyard shift at a printing co, taking a rural route between bartlesville (where i lived) and dewey. i do not remember exact the date of the event today. i was going north on virginia rd and just before the turnoff to go east at 9th st which would take me into dewey, i noticed a low red light to the northeast, miles away, near busy highway 75. the light had never been there before so caught my attention. i assumed it was a broadcasting tower being erected so i decided to take a longer route of two miles further north before turning to head east toward hwy 75 and this light. it was indiscernible from an ordinary red light on any communications tower except that it alternately pulsated or remained on for several seconds.
i made the turn onto county road 1300 to head east toward 75 and went another two miles until i could tell there was no tower. i was absolutely amazed as i pulled up until parallel to it from the road and stopped near where railroad tracks crossed. it was close, on the north side of the road, roughly 100' in the air and maybe 150' from the road where i was stopped. this is when i got excited. there are sporadic houses here about 1/4 mile from hwy 75 and i was trying to figure out what this was when a white light appeared a few feet to the left of the red. the lights appeared to be larger than a light bulb and smaller than a cantaloupe. i cannot remember now how they sequenced, but the red light and white lights (eventually there were three white ones to the left of the red one, separated by a few feet) but they would pulse on/off or remain on at different times. then a beam of bright white spotlight shone straight down. this was directly into a back yard of a house that sat to the north of my position. now i'm thinking "my gosh! it's a ufo!"
then the beam that was shining straight down flashed off/on/off/on, then in a smooth mechanical fashion slowly directed it up 90 degrees until it was shining to straight west. i never saw a body or object, just these lights, which was strange because it was so close, although it was night.
my mind is racing now. i'm thinking "how many others from the highway are noticing this? isn't anyone else going to pull down here and check this out?!" it was a true phenomenon occurring. i looked to the house on the south side of the road and saw a curtain open and wondered if they saw it or if they were wondering what the heck i was doing parked in front of their home. i was also thinking i'm going to be late for work if i don't leave now. it was a very tough decision.
this is when the spotlight shining west went out, along with the white lights, and it began to drift west very slowly. at the first movement after it being stationary (it took me a few minutes to get to it from where i initially sighted it and it remained stationary for another 1-2 minutes after i stopped next to it before "drifting" to the west, parallel to this road i was on) i heard a very slight sound that i can only describe as a person with a wide open mouth quietly sighing next to you. i do not know for sure if it was from this object, but the noise occurred just as the lone red light (the other lights all went out upon it moving and the simultaneous noise i heard) began to drift straight west at what i would estimate as jogging speed, maybe 5mph.
i decided to get to work and not follow it. 
when i got to work, a miracle happened. my supervisor said we are low on orders to run on your machine. he gave me the option of sweeping floors all night or going home. i flew back out to that location and drove west on rd 1300 from hwy 75. i drove two miles past where i initially observed it and turned to go south toward bartlesville and there it was again! now it was only a white light halfway up the side of a wooded hill separated from me by about 1000' of pasture. it was to the west of me. i observed this light do a slow, methodical "study" pattern, rise a few feet, stop, drift a few feet, stop, lower a few feet, stop, repeat...Now i'm downright spooked. i'm alone on this desolate road with very few distant houses around and it's dark. i decided to race three miles home and wake my dad to ask if he wanted to see what i saw. i wanted another witness too. i was excited that he agreed and we sped back out there but dammit it was finally gone. my dad believed me though, thankfully. we drove around the area for about 15 minutes until we decided it was gone.
it looked like something man-made, but even at that close range i never saw any solid object nor heard any other noise than described, and it was a quiet night. i had my window down when stopped. it has baffled me for almost 33 years as i write this and it will until i die. i pored over the local paper the next few days to see if there was anything regarding it but there was not. to this day i just cannot imagine what it was i had witnessed.
i wrote down the event and drew the lights that week but it is buried in a notebook amongst much clutter in a shed somewhere. i remember drawing the two-mile path on a map it must have taken between my two visuals of it.R about 15 minutes until we decided it was gone.
it looked like something man-made, but even at that close range i never saw any solid object nor heard any other noise than described, and it was a quiet night. i had my window down when stopped. it has baffled me for almost 33 years as i write this and it will until i die. i pored over the local paper the next few days to see if there was anything regarding it but there was not. to this day i just cannot imagine what it was i had witnessed.
i wrote down the event and drew the lights that week but it is buried in a notebook amongst much clutter in a shed somewhere. i remember drawing the two-mile path it must have taken in my absence on a map between my two instances of witnessing the thing when i had to go check in at work.
what in the world was it?!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White/red lights separated and throbbing at intermittent intervals, sometimes staying on. white spotlight or beam also

content.detailedDescription: I spent 6 years in the military, 4 working with special operations and recently worked as a contractor for the army training troops before they deployed to a combat zone earning 2 awards from the us army special forces, seeing every type aircraft and helocopters each branch has, that being said i know aircraft. i stepped out to smoke a cigarette and as i often do i stared at the stars, traveling from the n heading s i noticed the small cigar shaped silhouette with 4 bright light s heading in a perfect straight line, the two lights in the middle were bigger and brighter, i then noticed the black helicopter (blackhawk/jay hawk) and i could clearly see the light on the tail to make out the helo, about halfway through the sighting the two middle lights on the unidentified aircraft got extremely bright for about 10 seconds and then dimmed back down, it was odd to me because the unidentified aircraft flew in such a precise route and the fact that i couldn't tell what type this aircraft could possibly be.  neither aircraft had at any time made any sound what so ever.
content.summary: A strange cigar shape with white or green lights that at one point 2 of 4 got extremely bright it had a black helicopter traveling behind it with a noticeable tail light, both aircraft flew in a perfect straight line heading from a n to s direction

content.detailedDescription: I am a former police officer and the owner-operator of a security firm. at approximately 9 pm on date above i walked to my car to survey the community park located between windmill village south and windmill village north. my car was facing e. there was no traffic noise, no activity or ambient sound at all.Inexplicably in the middle of my survey, i looked straight up to my right (w) and saw an object at my 1 o'clock. i saw three dull red solid lights that when measured at arms length where 6 inches across using my thumb and forefinger as measuring guides.They were in a chevron or equilateral triangle shape with one light in the front facing e the other 2 were in the n and s position. no movement was observed.There were no reference points. my second observation of object(there are no time references,no sound,no markers)it had traveled to the e sky at my 11 o'clock. there was no apparent change in altitude or configuration. my only thought was "this is not an aircraft". it continued eastward. i broke visual contact and drove away with no recollection of the incident for 18 days. on 1/14/15 i had one brief thought-it surfaced like a bubble- about three red lights and it went away immediately. on 1/25/15 i was in general conversation with a business associate when the thought/memory again resurfaced, i shared what i experienced with my friend and then my wife. several additional facts have eluded me until now. 1.) i had no peripheral vision while observing the craft, no stars or sky.I was experiencing an extreme type of "tunnel vision". 2.)i turned to face the second point of observation without ever recalling that i changed my body position  3.)i drove away resuming patrol with no recall for almost a week. 4.) i carry binocs, cell/camera phone and a samsung sureshot camera for work purposes 5.)at no time was there a conscious thought to record this event-no emotion or curiosity which is in opposition to my professional observation and logic based thinking. closing thought:it appears that my later recalled observations may be as or more significant thant the original object sighting over buckeye.
content.summary: Sighted elevated object in w sky it moved right to left last observed in e sky.

content.detailedDescription: In early march 2011 my nephew (22) and i (43) were traveling south on us1 in lee county nc approaching sanford, nc. as we drove we saw far off in the distance ahead of us a collection of red and white lights, it looked like lights you would see on a cluster of radio towers.  as we drove toward the lights we noticed that the lights were getting closer to us and that they were not lights from radio towers, they were attached to individual crafts, the crafts were flying in a straight line towards us, maybe 1000-1500 feet in the air, they were black isosceles triangle shapes with slightly longer sides than the rear of the craft. each had a single bright white light in each of the corners and a slightly larger red light in the center. the vehicles were very large and if they were 1000-1500 feet in the air i would estimate the length to be about 600 feet and the width across the back to be about 400 feet. as the first craft approached it flew directly over my truck and made an angular turn towards the east, the second craft approached and made the exact same turn at the exact speed at the exact point where the first had always maintaining the exact distance from the first craft.  there was a gap of perhaps 2000 feet between the second craft and the third craft, the third craft was followed by a fourth craft. all four were identical and silent. the third and fourth crafts maintained the same distance between them the first and second had demonstrated then copied the exact movements of the first and second crafts with the same precision. it was like two sets of pilots performing the same flight plan with incredible precision. once the four crafts had made the turn to the east and they resumed the straight line formation, they shot forward in the blink of an eye and came to stop or slowed back down to the original rate of speed we had observed. i would guess they traveled 6 or 7 miles in less than a second without a sound and then were able stop or slow without noticeable braking, it was just start stop, no gradual acceleration or deceleration. no noticeable change in altitude, they appeared to be hovering or slowly trolling the skies over the small town of broadway, nc. while the crafts were still approaching us one after another i told my nephew to pull over as i wanted to get out and watch them but he would not stop the truck as we drove with the crafts low on the horizon we lost sight of them behind the trees. he was very freaked out by the events.  i cannot stop myself from scanning the night skies since then. we were close to my house at the time we saw them, when we got home we replayed the story a dozen times trying to make sense of it. to this day i believe i saw something either extra-terrestrial or some sort of government ultra secret high technology like nothing this world has seen before. i am betting on the ets though, this was far too advanced for us yet.
content.summary: Four slow moving identical black triagles following each other

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It happened on january 1 after returning from my brother in-law's house after spending the holidays there, we went to park the car in the garage four blocks from our house.

the garage is a large open sky lot located in camino maldonado (big avenue) esq. roma next to the police caminera (highway patrol).

after parking the car, we were walking towards the exit and asked my wife if she had grabbed the house keys, she returned to the car to look for the key's as she had forgotten, i stay with my 7 month old daughter on her stroller standing in the middle of the lot.

the sky was clear and there were three small cloud's with a strange elongated shape and that seemed to be very low. 


as i admired them i notice motion from my right (i was looking camino maldonado to the south). 

at first i thought it was a formation of birds flying because there was no noise.

he got behind the first cloud when he was back in sight i thought it was a plane but notice some white spots in a v-shaped pattern and thought again it's just birds.

then he passed behind the second cloud and when it came out i was already following with my eyes  to the east where the moon shone and the sky was really clear.

so when it came out i could clearly see the silhouette of the object, the color was black or charcoal gray opaque with light absorbing coat like a b2, had a v-shape but with a wing half or a third length of the other in a very distinctive way.

it had five white diffuse circles beneath, one on the tip, two on the long wing and one on the short. they seemed like lights but didn't glow; they brightened the area contrasting on the dark surface but the edges where diffuse.

then he went straight on his flight path and i lose sight of him over the opposite wall of the garage. 

the height of the object seemed low, just above these low strange clouds the whole sighting lasted about 10 or 12 seconds.

call my wife several times as i watched but she did not hear me, was busy looking for the keys.
content.summary: Like a chevron with one wing 1/2 or 2/3 shorter than the other

content.detailedDescription: observed:  10:32am 2/21/15. i work at home and went out to my back yard to bring in the cat.  i could see the light clouds overhead to the north. i noticed a small white object along a line of clouds. i dismissed at first as a balloon but it seemed not to be moving with the air flow. there is a very light wind at approx. 1-5 mph from the south to the north. i got a pair of binoculars and fount the object  still in the same position. through the lens it appeared jelly bean shaped, white and holding position. it was slowly moving south as i began to track it. it did not change shape. it moved from roughly 75 degrees above the horizon to directly overhead. in the pan of 30 mins. i then noticed a fainter rose colored similar shaped object 10 degrees lower and 20 degrees to the right of the first object.  both were moving to the south. i observed this till both object had slowly risen in altitude till they were no longer visible roughly 35 mins later
content.summary: 2 bean shaped objects sighted to the nw sky los angeles

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and saw a flashing red and white light coming in the distance so i got my cell phone. they were flying in a path but they changed from red to white and would be in a different spot everytime they reappeared. not a smooth flight pattern but irrattic like!  the first one stopped behind the tree lline behind my house waiting on another oblect that looked just like it and i tried to video it but it wouldn't work so i took a picture. i didn't realize i actually got a partial picture of one until later. the next day the military flew by really low in a b-52 airplane and several military helicopters were in the area at the same time also.
content.summary: I saw one coming and it stopped behind the tree tops waiting on the other one. i tried to video it but only got a partial picture

content.detailedDescription:
O vi do quarto do meu hotel.
meu nome ã‰ charles mendes carvalho, sou de muriaã‰, brasil
estava pairando acima da igreja, e em forma de triã‚ngulo.
assisti ontem o programa da mufon e levei um susto, poqrue o objeto que mostravam era igual ao que eu havia  visto.

content.detailedDescription: I couldn't tell how big it was or how far away... it was dark and i was driving.  it was shiny-ish and had a light on each end and one on the bottom.  each light blinked in a different pattern and they seemed to change when it changed direction. it was hovering to my right then zipped over to my left the zipped behind me and i lost sight of it...Super weird!
content.summary: Shiny oblong orb with 3 lights hovering with quick change of direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home on my balcony it was 3 something am and was smoking a cigarette bevore turn to bed. between the skyscrapers i saw a bright light right above the hill. first i thougt it could be anything and i didnt care... so i smoked another one and looked out for some chicks or something, and then i felt like the light is ascending because now i could see another one coming behind the roof (in front of me). and when i saw the third light, i also begun to recognize the shape because it was a lil darker then the clouds.Suddenly a big flash scared me and it took off sooooooo fast into the clouds thats why i could see a triangular shape. while it took off, all the streetlights and lights in the buildings and around went off one after another ( is a scarry sound).Everything was dark and i thougt (f*%&ing......Aliens are attacking us...?!!!?) then a car drove down the street, the only light i could see. then i heard my heart pumping again... and very fast.Ididnt want to move cause maybe i was lilbit shocked! after 1-2 minutes all the power and the lights came back. and the feeling of safety crumbles back...
at the next day i asked some friends who went clubbing that evening, and they said, yeah the power went off for 5 min..... so i was sure that i wasnt dreaming!

but zürich and all over switzerland we have a very great powe,rsystem.
and if somewhere the power goes down, it takes till 10 seconds maximum, to run power again. but mostly it doesent even take a second.

so 3 min blackout in the whole city, bright big flash and a big structure with 3 lights, wich took of like a punch of bruce lee.

someone made a video of this craft or lights at youtube: ufo zürich
content.summary: Big flash, fast disapearing from ufo,and zürich had no electricity for about 3 min. brownouts are not possible in switzerland, not for 3 min!

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a friends house around 3 am to go home and which seemed light a spot light hit hit my vehicle. i pulled over cause i thought it was a police officer or something then the light disapeered. i got out of my truck and saw which looked to be a large cylinder shaped object.It kept pointing very light beams of light i field with livestock.The object would then hover low off the ground then move at a incredbe amount of speed to a different area.I was so scared and shocked what i was seeing. i almost felt like i was paralized.I know 100% that it was not a man made craft cause i see jets and c5 air crafts all of the time because i live right by travis air force base. at the time i was 19 but this is the third unidentified flying object i have seen in the area.The first one i saw i was 5 years old in my back yard at my previous resident. the night in 2010 has haunted me every since and my friend who lives in dixon told me yesterday he saw something very similar and he wants to remain anonymous. but lately i have been having dreams every night about what happened.And the thing that scares me the most is when i saw the craft i felt like i was paralized. i wanted to get out of there but for some reason i watched the whole thing. and i know this maybe going overboard but there is no way that we have the technology to have a craft do the movements it was doing. this has just scared me for life and the dreams i keep having i can't sleep anymore. i'm just lost and the two other crafts i saw were basicly in the same area  .It has effected my whole life and it'll stay with me forever.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Spot light my vehicle then kept moving at inciedble speeds

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my sister were home alone, she was downstairs, while i was upstairs on the main floor watching a movie. sort of slowly a rumble sort of crept up and kept getting more and more intense. it got to the point where cups, dishes, and nick-knacks were rattling extremely to the point where i picked up a few and tried to find a good place to stand as i thought it was an earthquake. 

my sister ran up the stairs and we stood in the middle of the living room staring out our massive bay windows as by that time we realized something was moving over the house and it was extremely close! probably less than twenty or so feet above us. it moved slowly past us and we saw it in extreme detail. our home was the highest point in our small town, so we really had the best view of it. i had about 10 minutes from the start of the occurrence to the time i could not see it anymore.

the round lights on the bottom of the craft had orange (possibly red) lights along the outer edge of each circular light and a white light in the center of each. occasionally these lights would dim out (sort of pulsating) and you could still see the orange/red lights and they never went off. the craft moved extremely slowly as it went past our home and me and my sister both witnessed it in its entirety. she went downstairs to get a different look at it as it lazily passed (we had sunroofs down there and more bay windows). 

the craft was incredibly loud, to the point where we were both having to sort of yell at one another from close proximity. the craft was huge, from end to end it had to be over a football field in width and length. i have walked through 747's and other large aircraft before. this dwarfed anything i have ever seen. it had details like box shaped outlines of equipment all over the bottom of the aircraft (although my sister had a better view of that from the sunroof), however it was still clear as day. i could make out a small dome-ish structure on the bottom side of the craft between each circle light and a larger dome where on the underside at the very center of the craft. it was visibly much more dark around the center of the aircraft, around the larger dome. each dome looked like it was made of black glass of some kind.

it was very sleek and if it had been another 30 to 40 feet higher i wouldn't have been able to make out the domes as they were not very steep in angle. this craft set off multiple car alarms of neighbors up and down the street due to the rumbling and loud noise. i would equate the noise to standing right next to a jet while it was taking off. however,this thing was traveling so slowly it looked like it was just casually floating on by. its speed was ridiculously slow and i had a good long look as it passed us by. there was no exhaust of any kind from the large ship. 

my cats were so startled from it, they ran upstairs and hid under the bed. it flew in a straight line, slightly ascending (however, it's hard to gauge ascension as something is flying directly away). it remained low as it passed over all the other houses and trees. it finally disappeared over off in the distance and i could still hear it's hum after i lost sight of it. when my dad came home from his outing to the grocery store me and my sister told him what we saw, he said he saw something on his way home, but he didn't feel any rumbling or anything. 

i thought it was strange as there were no emissions coming from it. me and my sister concluded that it was some sort of military ufo and never really talked about it again, but i think we told ourselves that more for peace of mind then anything else. i don't know what it was and so on that account it is a ufo, however, terrestrial or extraterrestrial is still undetermined. but, based upon my familiarity with known planes and aircraft in the years since then, i know there is nothing that big flying around right now. i've walked right under the wings of some of the largest planes and each v-wing of that craft i saw was something on the scale of four to five times bigger than the biggest craft i know of. i honestly to this day just can't account for something like that in the skies. at that slow of a speed i would expect something to just fall right out of the sky.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Very large chevron shaped aircraft, going extremely slow, had circular lights and domes on bottom of craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was having dinner with my father and my little brother; next to us was another family composed by a mother, a father and 2 children.

the restaurant was inside the second floor of a building, and i could see outside the window. i see this ufo hovering in the roof of the building in front of the restaurant, after which i call it out; we all stand up to look at it, stunned at what we were observing; a massive 10 meter long object with a ton of lights was just floating there, no clue how it got there, just appeared out of nowhere. no one could react and grab something to record; the father from the family next to us said "what is that?" to which noone answered, we were astonished. 2 minutes later this thing just flies away, we just sat and said "that was unreal." for some reason we brushed it off, didn't question what happened and continued eating, as if we were in fear to what that was.
content.region: Magallanes y la Antártica Chilena Region
content.summary: Having dinner on a restaurant, ufo hovers on top of the building in front
content.locationName: Punta Arenas, Magallanes y la Antártica Chilena Region
